humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the number of nodes sampled is 3 and the number of nodes positive is 0. This matches with New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that the patient had a surgical resection of the left breast with a tumor size of 3.5 cm and histology showing an infiltrating mammary carcinoma with lobular features. The report also states that 3 lymph nodes were sampled and none of them were found to have metastases. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0, which means no regional lymph node metastasis.
